verbLexeme: 1. To make works of art by carving and shaping stone, wood, or clay. English = sculpt, carve.
nominalLexeme: 1. A work of art that is made by carving and shaping stone, wood, or clay. English = sculpture.
2. An artist who makes works of art from carving and shaping stone, wood, or clay. English = sculptor.
oldEntry: Popular explanation: hammering away at a hard substance.
